name: SURVATORY - A beautiful magical Survival RPG [Development Build]
name_original: SURVATORY - A beautiful magical Survival RPG [Development Build]
description:
A beautiful & stylized Survival RPG set in a slightly phantasy & magical world.  With unique and more realistic ways to survive and maintain health in the process. Just eating is not everything, it highly matters what you eat. Consumable items have a nutritional profile and the stat that define how you can use that and the best way to use them. Foods not just have nutrition but can have some amount of toxicity too and also contain some magic value that can contribute to your magic profile.

Important Note :

This is not a full game as already mentioned above, basic functions like pick up, eating and health system, etc are not added yet although you can throw a stone and hit fruits and make them fall. But what you get is a beautiful phantasy open world to explore and excess all the future updates from this page also get informed about anything important via Itch inbuilt email system.  You can discuss anything below.
